name: mixme

0.0.1.name: mixme
0.0.1.description: A library for recursive merging of Javascript objects

scripts.version: version=`grep '^  "version": ' package.json | sed 's/.*"\([0-9\.]*\)".*/\1/'` && sed -i "s/## Trunk/## Version $version/" CHANGELOG.md && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.postversion: git push origin master && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
